name: openrgb-sync-accent-color
description: Synchronize GNOME accent colors with OpenRGB devices
author: Álan Crístoffer e Sousa <acristoffers@startmail.com>

scripts.build:all: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:schemas
scripts.pack: pnpm run build:all && pnpm run pack:copy && pnpm run pack:zip
scripts.pack:copy: mkdir -p dist/schemas && cp schemas/*.xml dist/schemas/ && cp metadata.json dist/
scripts.install: pnpm run pack && pnpm run install:copy
scripts.install:copy: rm -rf ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/openrgb-sync-accent-color@evertonstz.github.io && mkdir -p ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions && cp -r dist ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/openrgb-sync-accent-color@evertonstz.github.io && cp schemas/gschemas.compiled ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/openrgb-sync-accent-color@evertonstz.github.io/schemas/
scripts.dev: pnpm run check && pnpm run test:run && pnpm run build:all
